item.title: Things to know about Proofreading
item.description: Proofreading is the process of looking for and correcting errors in your work i.e. finding and correcting spelling, grammar, punctuation, consistency and errors. Proofreading is the last step in your writing and editing process. You should have written and edited your work for general coherence and flow before proofreading.
